Reverse: search of the photograph on Yandex led to an article on the website studycareer.com, which stated that the child was hurt in a train accident in Bangladesh and was separated from her family.
A keyword search on Google led to severa: including one from The Business Standard, which identified the toddler as Mahima and provided details of the train accident in which she was injured.
The incident took place on November 12: and news reports confirmed that at least 16 people were killed and dozens injured in the collision of two intercity trains in Brahmanbaria's Kasba.
Daily Bangladesh reported that the child: and her picture with a bandage over her head went viral on social media to find her identity.
